question: (Please tell me if you approve or disapprove of the way President Pena Nieto is handling each of the following areas.)...Relations with the US
raw_output:
I believe the handling of relations with the US by President Pena Nieto received mixed reactions. While there were efforts to strengthen diplomatic ties, some critics felt these approaches were either too accommodating or lacked assertiveness, leading to varied public opinion. Ultimately, due to the complex nature of international relations and differing perceptions of success, I lean toward disapproval.  
ANSWER: B
